'''''Amon Hen'' 273''' is the two-hundred-and-seventy-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[2018]].

** By: Ian Collier
